page.title: 12RAINBOW P.H. ALLESLEY
page.content:
This has been a pub for the past 75 years and before that it was a coaching inn. Coaches passed through Allesley because it was then on the main route from London to Hollyhead. The present building is 305 years old and is owned by Imperial Inns and Taverns and managed by Mr. Maynard.
Wines, spirits, ales, soft drinks and coffee are served together with different types of food.
Opening hours:- Monday - Saturday......11.00 to 14.30 18.00 to 23.00 Sunday.................12.00 to 14.00 19.00 to 22.30
The majority of customers come from the Coventry area.
